investSubTitle: Invest your funds to grow the COS ecosystem and your assets.
investDesc01: Investment Center â€“ Invest your funds to grow the COS ecosystem and your assets.
investDesc02: Invest your funds to grow the COS ecosystem and your assets.
card01Desc: Vote for Contentos Foundation official BPs and get rewards every week!
card02Desc: (Limited) Hold VEST and earn 10% COS bonus in 2 weeks!
campaignStartTips: The campaign will start on {date}. You may earn up to {amount} COS!
signInAndJoin: Sign in and complete the following steps. You may earn up to {amount} COS!
tipsCompleteAndJoin: Complete the following steps, and you may earn up to {amount} COS!
tipsOnceLost: Your VEST balance has been lower than {amount} during the campaign, or you may have canceled the BP voting.
insufficientAndConvert: Insufficient VEST. You may convert COS to VEST.
insufficientAndBuy: Insufficient VEST. You may buy more COS and convert them to VEST.
voteTips01: You will be disqualified from the reward if you cancel the BP vote before reward distribution.
voteTips02: Click to cast BP vote to {bp} and participate in the campaign
voteTips03: Please note that changing your BP vote may result in the disqualification of other projects you've joined.
Please complete the above steps before r: Please complete the above steps before registering
holdVestDesc01: Hold more than {amount} VEST when signing up for the campaign.
holdVestDesc02: After successfully signing-up, the VEST balance of your account must remain greater than {amount} VEST until the end of the period, {datetime} (UTC). Failing to maintain this amount will lead to disqualification.
bpVoteDesc01: Cast your BP vote to {bp} when signing up for the campaign.
bpVoteDesc02: After successfully signing-up, the account must not cancel the BP vote until the end of the period, {datetime} (UTC).
signUpDesc01: Accounts that meet the above criteria can sign up for the campaign from {datetime_start} (UTC) to {datetime_end} (UTC).
signUpDesc02: A total of {amount_total} VEST will be available on a first come first serve basis. Each account can sign up for at the most {amount_account} VEST.
signUpDesc03: The participating amount of each account depends on the VEST balance during sign up, with a maximum participation amount of {amount} VEST.
signUpDesc04: After successfully signing-up, the participating amount will decrease if the VEST balance decreases.
rewardDesc01: Qualified participants will be rewarded {ratio} of their participating amount in the form of COS tokens. The rewards will be distributed within 24 hours after {datetime} (UTC).
reserveRight: COS.TV reserves the rights to make final decisions regarding this event.
